sentences: He is best known for being a former member of Sharon Jones & the Dap-Kings from 2004 to 2010 and playing with The Roots on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon.
Hendrickson-Smith was born in New Orleans and graduated from State College Area High School in 1992.
Hendrickson-Smith began his professional music career in 1996.
From 2004 to 2010, Hendrickson-Smith was a member of Sharon Jones & the Dap-Kings.
Hendrickson-Smith is currently a member of The Tonight Show band with The Roots, after joining the band in February 2014.
Hendrickson-Smith currently resides in New York.
